rows.label: tlk46300077_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Acedia! Whether it's
sightseeing or shopping you're
after, Acedia has it all.

rows.label: tlk46300077_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Tensions are rising between
Invidia and Superbia, but
Acedia is a safe haven.

rows.label: tlk46300077_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The cathedral, where Pope Marveni
resides, is just up those steps.

rows.label: tlk46300077_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You'll probably want to tarry a while
in Poldis Circle, though. You can get
all kinds of Acedian specialties there.
